<title>ebay store</title>
<style>
#topheader {
width:968px;
height:243px;
margin:0 auto;
}
#mainbody {
width:968px;
height:auto;
margin:0 auto;
text-align: left;
position:relative;
}
#mainbody h1 {
font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size:12px;
color:#FFF;
margin:2px 0;
font-weight: bold;
}
.categorysecs {
width:200px;
border:solid 1px #c9c9c9;
margin-bottom:3px;
/*min-height:198px;*/
}
.categorysecs1 {
width:200px;
border:solid 1px #c9c9c9;
margin-bottom:3px;
/*min-height:198px;*/
}
.categorysecheadings {
width:195px;
height:21px;
background:#f3b000;
margin:4px auto;
font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size:12px;
color:#fff;
font-weight:bold;
text-align:left;
padding-top: 4px;
padding-left: 3px;
}
.categorysecrows {
width:190px;
height:17px;
font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size:12px;
color: #4b7088;
text-align:left;
margin: 0 auto;
border-bottom:solid 1px #dfdfdf;
padding-top: 3px;
}
.midsec {
width:200px;
margin-left:3px;
height: auto;
margin-right: 3px;
}
.midsec a{
color:#4B7088;
text-decoration:none;
font-size:12px;
}
.midsecheadings {
width:151px;
height:31px;
margin-left:6px;
color:#15538e;
}
.midseccoloums {
width:603px;
height:150px;
margin-left:4px;
text-align:left; 
}
.banners {
width:155px;
min-height:200px;
margin-bottom: 3px;
}
.bannerrows {
margin: 0 auto;
padding-top: 3px;
}
/*condition and contract box settings*/
#conditionwrapper {
width: 600px;
height: 183px;
margin: 0 auto;
border: #e5e5e5 1px solid;
}
.conditionsections{
width: 148px;
height: 179px;
float: left;
border: #e5e5e5 1px solid;
}
#conditionwrapper .header{
width: 148px;
height: 28px;
border-bottom: solid 1px #e5e5e5; 
}
#conditionwrapper .header p {
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-weight: bold;
font-size: 12px;
margin: 6px 0 0 4px;
color: #15538e;
}
#conditionwrapper .detail{
width: 150px;
height: 150px;
}
#conditionwrapper .detail .img{
width: 100px;
height: 48px;
margin: 0 auto;
text-align: center;
padding-top: 2px;
}
#conditionwrapper .detail .textcont{
width: 148px;
height: 98px;
margin: 0 auto;
font-family: Arial, Helvetica;
font-size: 12px;
}
#conditionwrapper .detail .textcont p{
font-family: Arial, Helvetica;
font-size: 12px;
margin:10px 0 0 2px;
text-align: justify;
width:130px;
}
#packagecont {
width: 600px;
height: 130px;
margin: 4px auto;
border: #e5e5e5 1px solid;
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 12px;
}
#packagecont #heading{
width: 600px;
height: 34px;
background:#38a5f1;
}
#packagecont #heading p{
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 13px;
color: #fff;
margin: 0;
padding-top: 10px;
padding-left: 5px;
}
/*End condition and contract box settings*/
#bottombody {
margin-top:0px;
border-style:solid;
width:964px;
height:700px;
border-color:#CCC;
border-width:1px;
}
#bottombody h1 {
text-align:left;
font-size:18px;
font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
margin:0;
color:#caa54a;
margin-left:10px;
font-weight: bold;
}
#bottombody h2 {
text-align:left;
font-size:14px;
font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; 
color:#000;
margin:10px 0 0 10px;
}
#bottombody p {
text-align:left;
font-size:12px;
font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; 
color:#000;
text-align:justify;
width:934px;
font-weight:normal;
margin:3px 0 0 10px;
}
#shipping_paymentform {
width:964px;
height:30px;
margin:0 auto;
margin-top: 20px;
}
#shipping_paymentform .formbox {
min-width:25px;
float:left;
height:25px;
font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size:12px;
color:#6b6b6b;
margin-left: 5px;
}
.quantityfield {
width:52px;
height:18px;
border:solid 1px #999;
box-shadow: 0 0 3px #999 inset;
}
.countryfield {
width:215px;
height:23px;
border:solid 1px #999;
box-shadow: 0 0 3px #999 inset;
}
/*shipping and handling details*/
#shipping_handlingdetail {
width:964px;
height:34px;
background:url(test.webtoniq-us.com/ebaydemo2/images/shippingdetailbeadbg.jpg) repeat-x;
margin-top:10px;
}
.headinginnerbox {
width:150px;
height:24px;

font:12px arial,sans-serif;

}

width:250px;

}

height:24px;

font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color: #d19607;

text-align: center;
padding-top: 10px;
}
.shipping_detail {
width:964px;
height:24px;
margin-top:2px;
}
.detailinnerbox {
width:150px;
height:19px;
float:left;
text-align:center;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color: #6b6b6b;
padding-top: 5px;
}
.detailservicesbox {
width:250px;
height:19px;
float:left;
text-align:center;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color: #6b6b6b;
padding-top: 5px;
font-weight:bold;

height:19px;
float:left;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color: #6b6b6b;
text-align: center;
padding-top: 5px;
}
#buyerprotection {
width: 600px;
height: 68px;
position: absolute;
left: 302px;
top: 1301px;
display:none;
}
#return { 
font:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif 14px bold;
colour:#000;
margin-top:150px;
padding-left:10px; 
}
#return h1 { 
font:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif bold; font-size:14px;
color:#000;
}
/*after receiving...*/
#shipping_handlingdetail2 {
width:964px;
height:31px;
background:url(test.webtoniq-us.com/ebaydemo2/images/shippingdetailbeadbg2.jpg) repeat-x;
margin-top:3px;
}
.headinginnerbox2 {
width:295px;
height:24px;
float:left;
text-align:center;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color:#464646;

padding-top: 7px;
}
.headingservicesbox2 {
width:300px;
height:24px;
float:left;
text-align:center;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color:#464646;
font-weight:bold;
padding-top: 7px;
}
.shipping_detail2 {
width:964px;
height:24px;
margin-top:2px;
}
.detailinnerbox2 {
width:150px;
height:19px;
float:left;
text-align:center;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color: #6b6b6b;
padding-top: 7px;
}
.detailservicesbox2 {
width:250px;
height:19px;
float:left;

font:12px arial,sans-serif;

}
/*after receiving end...*/
/*30 days*/

width:964px;

}
.headinginnerbox3 {
width:85px;
height:24px;
float:left;
text-align:center;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color:#60605e;
font-weight:normal;
padding-top: 7px;
}
.headinginnerbox3_2 {
width:540px;
height:24px;
float:left;
text-align:right;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color:#60605e;

}
.headingservicesbox3 {
width:280px;
height:24px;
float:left;

}
.shipping_detail3 {
width:964px;

}
.detailinnerbox3 {
width:150px;
height:19px;
float:left;

font:12px arial,sans-serif;

}
.detailinnerbox3_2 {
width:150px;
height:19px;
float:left;

font:12px arial,sans-serif;

padding-top: 7px;}
.detailservicesbox3 {
width:250px;
height:19px;
float:left;
text-align:center;
font:12px arial,sans-serif;
color: 60605e;
padding-top: 5px;
font-weight:normal;
}
/*30 days end*/
#returndetail {
width:964px;
height:30px;
background:#e8e8e8;
margin-top:3px;
}
#returndetail h1 {
font:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif 12 #464646;
padding-top:7px;
padding-left:9px;
color: #000;
font-size: 12px;
}
#end_points{
margin:0;
float:left;
padding-left:7px;
padding-top:5px; 
} 
.end_points p{ 
font:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif 12px normal #60605e; 
}
/*End shipping and handling details*/

----------------------------------*/

.ui-state-active a, .ui-state-active a:link, .ui-state-active a:visited { color: #212121; outline: none; text-decoration: none; }
/* Interaction Cues
----------------------------------*/
.ui-state-highlight, .ui-widget-content .ui-state-highlight {border: 1px solid #fcefa1; background: #fbf9ee url(images/ui-bg_glass_55_fbf9ee_1x400.png) 50% 50% repeat-x; color: #363636; }

.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-prev-hover, .ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-next-hover { top: 1px; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-prev { left:2px; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-next { right:2px; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-prev-hover { left:1px; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-next-hover { right:1px; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-prev span, .ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-next span { display: block; position: absolute; left: 50%; margin-left: -8px; top: 50%; margin-top: -8px; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-title { margin: 0 2.3em; line-height: 1.8em; text-align: center; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-title select { float:left; font-size:1em; margin:1px 0; }

.ui-datepicker select.ui-datepicker-month, 
.ui-datepicker select.ui-datepicker-year { width: 49%;}
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-title select.ui-datepicker-year { float: right; }
.ui-datepicker table {width: 100%; font-size: .9em; border-collapse: collapse; margin:0 0 .4em; }
.ui-datepicker th { padding: .7em .3em; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; border: 0; }
.ui-datepicker td { border: 0; padding: 1px; }
.ui-datepicker td span, .ui-datepicker td a { display: block; padding: .2em; text-align: right; text-decoration: none; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-buttonpane { background-image: none; margin: .7em 0 0 0; padding:0 .2em; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; border-bottom: 0; }
.ui-datepicker .ui-datepicker-buttonpane button { float: right; margin: .5em .2em .4em; cursor: pointer; padding: .2em .6em .3em .6em; width:auto; overflow:visible; }

.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li a, .ui-tabs.ui-tabs-collapsible .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-selected a { cursor: pointer; padding-top:7px; } /* first selector in group seems obsolete, but required to overcome bug in Opera applying cursor: text overall if defined elsewhere... */
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel { padding: 1em 1.4em; display: block; border-width: 0; background:#FFF; border: 1px solid #c2c2c2; margin-top:-9px; }
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-hide { display: none !important; }
